package.name: xbot_positioning
package.description:
XBot Positioning package for OpenMower.
Provides sensor fusion using an Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) to combine: - RTK GPS position data - IMU gyroscope data - Wheel encoder odometry
Outputs fused odometry and pose estimates for navigation.
Includes a header-only Kalman filter library (based on kalman-cpp by Markus Herb).
Ported from open_mower_ros (ROS1) to ROS2.
package.author: Clemens Elflein
Markus Herb (kalman-cpp library)
